title: Upon A Burning Body-The World Is My Enemy Now  MP3 320k ak
description:
Upon a Burning Body is a deathcore band from San Antonio, Texas. The band's second album, Red. White. Green., debuted at No. 105 on the Billboard 200 in 2012. They also did a cover of Florence And The Machine's "Lover To Lover" for Sumerian Records' "Florence + The Sphinx" compilation. Their newest album "The World Is My Enemy Now", is set to release on August 12, 2014.
